text: (he nabee!) ham aapake mukh ko baar-baar aakaash kee or phirate dekh rahe hain. to ham avashy aapako us qibale (kaaba) kee or pher denge, jisase aap prasann ho jaayen. to (ab) apane mukh masjide haî€¼raam kee or pher lo[1] tatha (he musalamaanon!) tum bhee jahaan raho, usee kee or mukh kiya karo aur nishchay ahle kitaab jaanate hain ki ye unake paalanahaar kee or se saty hai[2] aur allaah unake karmon se asoochit nahin hai
